definition: Macro aggregates and national accounts (GDP, growth, debt, BoP, reserves where macro-level).
Inflation/CPI, market price monitoring, cost-of-living baskets and price-based welfare proxies.
Exchange rates, FX markets, reserve policy, fragmentation spreads and currency controls.
Banking system, monetary aggregates, payments, financial stability, AML/CFT and inclusion.
Budget, revenues/expenditure, governance, procurement, public sector administration and accountability.
Imports/exports, customs, ports/shipping, trade policy, logistics and commerce flows.
Oil/gas, fuel prices, electricity generation, energy infrastructure and energy-market signals.
Employment, wages, livelihoods and labor market structure including worker remittances where evidenced.
ODA/humanitarian funding, donor projects pipeline, implementing partners and project monitoring.
Agriculture production, food security classifications, market systems, fisheries and land use for food.
Health, education, displacement, protection, demographics and social outcomes/human development.
Conflict incidence, political economy, war economy dynamics, sanctions context (descriptive).
Transport, WASH, telecom and other service delivery / public infrastructure status and disruptions.
Private sector, investment climate, corporate sector evidence, SMEs, FDI and market structure.
Narrative and qualitative sources: credible research, reports, policy briefs, and reputable media.
Satellite/remote sensing, climate/environmental datasets, vegetation/damage assessment and hazards.
